__inputs.description: Namespace associated with the Zenko instance
__inputs.label: namespace
__inputs.name: namespace

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle conductor job, used to filter only lifecycle conductor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle producer
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_producer

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle bucket processor job, used to filter only lifecycle bucket processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle bucket processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_bucket_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle object processor job, used to filter only lifecycle object processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle object processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_object_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle transition processor job, used to filter only lifecycle transition processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle transition processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_transition_processor

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle populator job, used to filter only lifecycle populator instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle populator
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_populator

__inputs.description: Name of the lifecycle gc processor job, used to filter only lifecycle gc processor instances
__inputs.label: job lifecycle gc processor
__inputs.name: job_lifecycle_gc_processor

targets.expr:
label_replace(
label_replace(
  sum(   label_replace(kafka_consumergroup_group_max_lag,
                 "consumergroup", "$1", "group", "(.*)")
   * on(consumergroup) group_right
   group(s3_zenko_queue_latest_consumed_message_timestamp{job=~"${job_lifecycle_producer}|${job_lifecycle_bucket_processor}|${job_lifecycle_object_processor}|${job_lifecycle_transition_processor}|${job_lifecycle_gc_processor}|${job_lifecycle_populator}", namespace="${namespace}"}) by(consumergroup, job)
) by(job)
, "job", "$1", "job", "${zenkoName}-backbeat-(?:lifecycle-)?(.*?)-headless")
, "job", "$1-processor", "job", "(gc|transition)")

panels.title: S3 Requests Aggregated status over time
